content: My name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Munich.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during our conversation.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number. (Please note that this question is only applicable if you answered "Yes" to the previous question.)
name: Evaluator

content: As I did not answer "Yes" to the previous question, there is no need to provide an exact number for the final price.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 5.
name: Farhad Abbasi
